r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - `dd_trace_forward_call()` to forward the original call from within a tracing closure #284
### Fixed - `parent::` keyword not honored from a subclass when forwarding a call from a tracing closure #284 - Private and protected callable strings not resolved properly from a tracing closure #303
